title: Cold Cucumber Soup with Mint
directions: In a bowl with a fork mash together yolk and vinegar to form a smooth paste and stir in sour cream until smooth.
In a blender purée cucumber and mint with buttermilk and salt to taste until smooth. Add purée to sour cream mixture in a stream, whisking.
ingredients: 1 chilled seedless cucumber (about 1 pound), peeled, halved lengthwise, cored, and cut into 1/2-inch pieces
1/4 cup fresh mint leaves, washed and spun dry
